calculator.description: Evaluate mathematical expressions, perform calculations with basic arithmetic, trigonometry, and logarithms
calculator.author: Chat UI Team

ui-demo.description: Demo server showcasing custom UI modification capabilities
ui-demo.author: Chat UI Team

pptx_generator.description: Create professional PowerPoint presentations from JSON data or Markdown content with automatic slide generation, bullet point formatting, and multimedia support
pptx_generator.author: Chat UI Team

pdfbasic.description: Extract and analyze text content from PDF documents, search within PDFs, and summarize content
pdfbasic.author: Chat UI Team

file_size_test.description: Simple test tool that accepts a file transfer and returns the file size in bytes
file_size_test.author: Chat UI Team

prompts.description: Specialized system prompts for AI behavior modification
prompts.author: Chat UI Team

env-demo.description: Demonstrates environment variable passing to MCP servers. Shows how to configure servers with env vars in mcp.json using both literal values and ${VAR} substitution.
env-demo.author: Chat UI Team

username-override-demo.description: Demonstrates the username override security feature that prevents LLM user impersonation. This server shows how Atlas UI automatically injects the authenticated user's email into tools that accept a 'username' parameter, ensuring tools always run with the correct user context. Try asking it to demonstrate override attempts or check user permissions.
username-override-demo.author: Atlas UI Team

elicitation_demo.description: Demonstrates MCP user elicitation capabilities - requesting structured input from users during tool execution. Shows examples of string, number, boolean, enum field elicitation, structured multi-field forms, and multi-turn elicitation flows.
elicitation_demo.author: Atlas UI Team

sampling_demo.description: Demonstrates MCP LLM sampling capabilities - requesting LLM text generation during tool execution. Shows examples of basic sampling, system prompts, temperature control, model preferences, multi-turn conversations, and agentic workflows.
sampling_demo.author: Atlas UI Team

image_demo.description: Demonstrates ImageContent display capabilities - MCP tools that return images. Generates test images as PNG files and displays them in the Atlas canvas. Tests single and multiple image returns.
image_demo.author: Atlas UI Team
